title: Happy Birthday, Ayumu-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Happy birthday! Ayumu-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you, Kotori-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Here is a little bit of a present….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Waa! What a cute hair ornament!! Did you make this yourself, Kotori-chan….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m happy….! I’m really happy, Kotori-chan! Thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Kyah…. Fufu. Ayumu-chan, it hurts~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah! S-, sorry! I was too happy…. Hey Kotori-chan, next time, can we make something together? I love sewing too, so I wanted to try making something with Kotori-chan at least once….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course! Since I already made one, let’s make a matching pair<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yaay! A matching pair with Kotori-chan, I’m so happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
